text: Ani anathanna te vayata ye'iparyanta tyanci dekharekha theva ani tyanci pariksa gheta raha. Maga jevha tumhala tyancyata sudharana va layaki disuna ye'ila, tevha tyanci sampatti tyancya havali kara ani te mothe hotila ya bhitine tyance dhana gha'igha'ine udhalapatti karita kha'una taku naka. Srimantanni tyancya sampattibabata ase karanyapasuna alipta rahave, tathapi gariba asela tara tyane vajavi ritinee khave, maga jevha tumhi tyanna tyanci sampatti sopavala tevha saksi karuna ghya, ani hisoba ghenyasathi tara allaha puresa ahe
